message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,400,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, I'm looking to spend no more than $1,200,000.  I'd be happy to buy it from you for that amount.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,300,000.
Alice, I understand you're trying to get the best price for your product, but I'm still limited by my budget of $1,200,000.  I'm willing to go up to $1,250,000, but that's my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $1,250,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,280,000, which is a compromise from my initial offer. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for this exceptional product.

Alice, I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm confident this product is worth a lot, but unfortunately, I can't go higher than my last offer of $1,250,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

I understand you're firm on your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more compromise, and I'll meet you at $1,290,000. This is my final concession, and I hope you'll consider it a fair price for this exceptional product.
